executable.title: Coregister B0 to Anatomy B-Spline
executable.description: This program will register a NRRD diffusion weighted 4D vector image to a fixed anatomical image to produce a Bspline fit.
executable.acknowledgements: Funding for this version of the GTRACT program was provided by NIH/NINDS R01NS050568-01A2S1
executable.contributor: This tool was developed by Vincent Magnotta and Greg Harris.

parameters.label: Input Image Parameters
parameters.description: Parameters for specifying the NRRD vector image to fit to the anatomical image

image.name: inputVolume
image.description: Required: input vector image file name. It is recommended that the input volume is the skull stripped baseline image of the DWI scan.
image.label: Input Image Volume

image.name: inputAnatomicalVolume
image.description: Required: input anatomical image file name. It is recommended that that the input anatomical image has been skull stripped and has the same orientation as the DWI scan.
image.label: Input Anatomical Image Volume

integer.name: vectorIndex
integer.description: Vector image index in the moving image (within the DWI) to be used for registration.
integer.label: Vector Image Index

transform.name: inputRigidTransform
transform.description: Required (for B-Spline type co-registration): input rigid transform file name. Used as a starting point for the anatomical B-Spline registration.
transform.label: Input Rigid Transform

transform.name: outputBsplineTransform
transform.description: Required: filename for the B-Spline fit transform.
transform.label: Output Transform

parameters.label: Registration Parameters
parameters.description: Input registration parameters controlling the fit

integer.name: numberOfIterations
integer.description: Number of iterations in the selected 3D fit
integer.label: Number Of Iterations

integer-vector.name: gridSize
integer-vector.description: Number of grid subdivisions in all 3 directions
integer-vector.label: Grid Size

integer.name: spatialScale
integer.description: Scales the number of voxels in the image by this value to specify the number of voxels used in the registration
integer.label: Spatial Scale

double.name: maxBSplineDisplacement
double.description: Sets the maximum allowed displacements in image physical coordinates for BSpline control grid along each axis. A value of 0.0 indicates that the problem should be unbounded. NOTE: This only constrains the BSpline portion, and does not limit the displacement from the associated bulk transform. This can lead to a substantial reduction in computation time in the BSpline optimizer.

integer.name: numberOfThreads
integer.label: Number Of Threads
integer.description: Explicitly specify the maximum number of threads to use.
